longDescription.value: ​15 pieces of the Colonel's famously delicious Wicked Wings®, with a spicy marinade and a crispy crunchy coating. Not everywhere and not forever.
Golden, thick-cut chips sprinkled with our signature seasoning to leave you wanting more… no wonder they’re Australia’s best tasting chips. Yeah, we went there.

content.longDescription: Golden, thick-cut chips sprinkled with our signature seasoning to leave you wanting more… no wonder they’re Australia’s best tasting chips. Yeah, we went there.
